testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.
testResults.title: 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).
testResults.title: 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 3. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 400 HTTP response status code when the request is rejected.
testResults.title: 3. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 400 HTTP response status code when the request is rejected.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 4. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a Verifiable Credential with the value of its "issuer" or "issuer.id" as a URI in the body of the response.
testResults.title: 4. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a Verifiable Credential with the value of its "issuer" or "issuer.id" as a URI in the body of the response.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 5. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.proofPurpose" in the body of the POST request is not supported.
testResults.title: 5. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.proofPurpose" in the body of the POST request is not supported.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 6. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.assertionMethod" in the body of the POST request does not exist.
testResults.title: 6. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.assertionMethod" in the body of the POST request does not exist.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 7. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request does not contain a context.
testResults.title: 7. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request does not contain a context.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 8. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request contains a malformed JSON-LD context.
testResults.title: 8. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request contains a malformed JSON-LD context.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mki93tJ2rwrDaWTMZcdMShk4xLWf75Fu559dAapKe8pdmX 9. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST support no "options" in the body of the POST request.
testResults.title: 9. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST support no "options" in the body of the POST request.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6MkjRagNiMu91DduvCvgEsqLZDVzrJzFrwahc4tXLt9DoHd 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6MkjRagNiMu91DduvCvgEsqLZDVzrJzFrwahc4tXLt9DoHd 2. testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.
testResults.title: 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).
testResults.title: 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 3. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 400 HTTP response status code when the request is rejected.
testResults.title: 3. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 400 HTTP response status code when the request is rejected.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 4. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a Verifiable Credential with the value of its "issuer" or "issuer.id" as a URI in the body of the response.
testResults.title: 4. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a Verifiable Credential with the value of its "issuer" or "issuer.id" as a URI in the body of the response.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 5. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.proofPurpose" in the body of the POST request is not supported.
testResults.title: 5. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.proofPurpose" in the body of the POST request is not supported.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 6. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.assertionMethod" in the body of the POST request does not exist.
testResults.title: 6. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "options.assertionMethod" in the body of the POST request does not exist.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 7. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request does not contain a context.
testResults.title: 7. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request does not contain a context.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6Mkg9AkjefxdJFSphkStzXwHQnbweN43mCqA37aANGRxF1o 8. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST reject if the value of "credential" in the body of the POST request contains a malformed JSON-LD context.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6MkkvPAU8JWm65ktjSBjtGkdhAb1q71C255Dyq1A53CSQUF 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.
testResults.title: 1. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a 201 HTTP response status code after successful credential issuance.

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6MkkvPAU8JWm65ktjSBjtGkdhAb1q71C255Dyq1A53CSQUF 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).
testResults.title: 2. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST require "credential" in the body of the POST request. The field "credential" MUST be conformant to [Verifiable Credentials Data Model 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/).

testResults.fullName: Issue Credential API - Conformance with issuer: did:key:z6MkkvPAU8JWm65ktjSBjtGkdhAb1q71C255Dyq1A53CSQUF 4. The Issuer's Issue Credential HTTP API MUST return a Verifiable Credential with the value of its "issuer" or "issuer.id" as a URI in the body of the response.
